seg-source.mrk: Empties the recycle bin.

target.mrk: Empties the recycle bin.

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: [optional] The rootpath to empty - if omitted the recycle bin for all drives is emptied.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The rootpath to empty - if omitted the recycle bin for all drives is emptied.

target.mrk: [optional]
The rootpath to empty - if omitted the recycle bin for all drives is emptied.

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: 0 (the recycle bin cannot be emptied - see below).

seg-source.mrk: 0 (the recycle bin cannot be emptied - see below).

target.mrk: 0 (the recycle bin cannot be emptied - see below).

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: For this function to work IE4+ must be available.

seg-source.mrk: For this function to work IE4+ must be available.

target.mrk: For this function to work IE4+ must be available.

seg-source.mrk: Related

target.mrk: Related

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: Open the recycle bin by using the following CLSID.

seg-source.mrk: Open the recycle bin by using the following CLSID.

target.mrk: Open the recycle bin by using the following CLSID.

trans-unit.source: Display a message box asking whether or not you would like to delete files in the recycle bin.

seg-source.mrk: Display a message box asking whether or not you would like to delete files in the recycle bin.

target.mrk: Display a message box asking whether or not you would like to delete files in the recycle bin.

trans-unit.source: Would you like to empty the recycle bin on the

seg-source.mrk: Would you like to empty the recycle bin on the

target.mrk: Would you like to empty the recycle bin on the

seg-source.mrk: \ drive?

target.mrk: \ drive?

trans-unit.source: Delete files in the recycle bin. This is for the @HomeDrive only, which is generally the C:\ drive.

seg-source.mrk: Delete files in the recycle bin.
This is for the @HomeDrive only, which is generally the C:\ drive.

target.mrk: Delete files in the recycle bin.
This is for the @HomeDrive only, which is generally the C:\ drive.

trans-unit.source: Display a message of whether the recycle bin was emptied successfuly.

seg-source.mrk: Display a message of whether the recycle bin was emptied successfuly.

target.mrk: Display a message of whether the recycle bin was emptied successfuly.

trans-unit.source: The recycle bin was emptied successfuly.

seg-source.mrk: The recycle bin was emptied successfuly.

target.mrk: The recycle bin was emptied successfuly.

trans-unit.source: The recycle bin wasn't emptied successfuly.

seg-source.mrk: The recycle bin wasn't emptied successfuly.

target.mrk: The recycle bin wasn't emptied successfuly.
